attributes.title: The Cookie Party - #21
attributes.description: Matt Hullum and Chris Demarais match wits with Burnie Burns and Kirk Johnson of Lazer Team in the season 3 opener of On The Spot: The Cookie Party!

attributes.title: My Bag of Emotions - #22
attributes.description: Joel Heyman, Gus Sorola, Jeremy Dooley and special guest John Erler tear through On The Spot: My Bag of Emotions.

attributes.title: The Eyebrow Cam - #23
attributes.caption: No one is safe from the eyebrow cam in episode #23 of On The Spot featuring Joel Heyman, Barbara Dunkelman, Aaron Marquis and Jeremy Dooley.
attributes.description: No one is safe from the eyebrow cam in episode #23 of On The Spot featuring Joel Heyman, Barbara Dunkelman, Aaron Marquis and Jeremy Dooley.

attributes.title: Danny LaBido - #24
attributes.caption: Lindsay Jones, Barbara Dunkelman, Aaron Marquis and special guest Mica Burton join Jon Risinger for On The Spot: Danny LaBido #24.  One team tells a prehistoric love tale and another face the nastiest redemption challenge yet!
attributes.description: Lindsay Jones, Barbara Dunkelman, Aaron Marquis and special guest Mica Burton join Jon Risinger for On The Spot: Danny LaBido #24. One team tells a prehistoric love tale and another face the nastiest redemption challenge yet!

attributes.title: Raw Bread - #25
attributes.caption: Special guests Paul Scheer (Scheer-RL http://bit.ly/1Loqb9y) and Kirk Johnson (http://bit.ly/1Bl3wLf) join Gus Sorola, Michael Jones, and Jon Risinger for On The Spot: Raw Bread - #25.
attributes.description: Special guests Paul Scheer and Kirk Johnson join Gus Sorola, Michael Jones, and Jon Risinger for On The Spot: Raw Bread - #25.

attributes.title: The Kevin Show - #26
attributes.caption: Hosted by Jon Risinger.  Featuring Joel Heyman, Jack Pattillo along with Chad James and John Francis McCullagh of ScrewAttack!
attributes.description: Hosted by Jon Risinger. Featuring Joel Heyman, Jack Pattillo along with Chad James and John Francis McCullagh of ScrewAttack!

attributes.title: The Load-Bearing Stripper Pole - #27
attributes.caption: Jon Risinger welcomes Lindsay Jones, Miles Luna, Kerry Shawcross, and special guest Shannon McCormick in this Fifty Shades episode of On The Spot: The Load-Bearing Stripper Pole - #27.
attributes.description: Jon Risinger welcomes Lindsay Jones, Miles Luna, Kerry Shawcross, and special guest Shannon McCormick in this Fifty Shades episode of On The Spot: The Load-Bearing Stripper Pole - #27.

attributes.title: All The High Fives - #28
attributes.caption: All The High Fives
attributes.description: Jon Risinger welcomes Burnie Burns, Aaron Marquis, and special guests Colton Dunn and John Erler in this episode of On The Spot: All The High Fives - #28.

attributes.title: The Great Seduction - #29
attributes.caption: The Great Seduction
attributes.description: Ryan and Gus take on Blaine and Kirk Johnson and the mystery chocolate redemption challenge is back!

attributes.title: The Cookie Hoover - #30
attributes.caption: The Slow Mo Guys versus Michael and Intern Andy in a 'crumby' battle for On The Spot #30
attributes.description: The Slow Mo Guys versus Michael and Intern Andy in a 'crumby' battle for On The Spot #30. This week's sponsors: Audible and Casper.

attributes.title: Six Pepperoni Slices - #31
attributes.description: Barbara, Lindsay, Ashley and Meg teach Jon the proper use of stirrups in On The Spot #31! This week's sponsor: Credit Karma

attributes.title: RTX 2015 - #32 (Ft. Game Grumps)
attributes.caption: Miles Luna and Kerry Shawcross take on Game Grumps in this special extended season finale of On The Spot from RTX 2015.
attributes.description: Miles Luna and Kerry Shawcross take on Game Grumps in this special extended season finale of On The Spot from RTX 2015.
